resources.string: Hello,I am Wang Xinchen.I am an active boy who has the mid-split hair and can play basketball very well.
I am referred as Dong Zhuo because of my nature:fond of keeping fish.
I currently have a large corporation called the Wang Aquatic Corp,It not only keeps fish,but also assembles wheels and ships.
Statement:This program is non-interactive and only have one page due to my ability as a starter and tight schedule.Please enjoy.
